rss.title: Anxious Accountant
rss.subtitle: A minimal, portfolio, sidebar, bootstrap Jekyll theme with responsive web design and focuses on text presentation.

entry.title: Stoop
entry.summary:
Score: 62 (out of 100) / Rank: 50th (out of 123 beers) / This one was very lively and there was a mild fruity smell, I did struggle to get the head to not be half of the glass when I poured.
Once it settled the taste was nice refereshing beer with a smooth aftertaste.
Overall a nice average beer.
Check out how I rank all the beers I have tried on my Non-Alcoholic Beer Journey)

entry.title: Speak Easy
entry.summary:
Score: 71 (out of 100) / Rank: 26th (out of 123 beers) / Another mental health beer this one with Nice fruity smell a bit fizzy off the bat but settled down.
A crisp taste with a little fruit coming through no real aftertaste to talk about.
This one went down well whilst watching the stranger things finale.
Check out how I rank all the beers I have tried on my Non-Alcoholic Beer...

entry.title: Lemon Gose
entry.summary:
Score: 62 (out of 100) / Rank: 49th (out of 123 beers) / A risky choice to try a new beer whilst my hayfever is bad but I have too many new beers to get through as I haven’t got through last month’s Afbeer club yet!
I couldn’t pick up anyhting in the smell but the taste came across as a tangy and refreshing with a mild aftertaste.
10% of all proceeds from this limited edition beer will go st...

entry.title: Point Five
entry.summary:
Score: 45 (out of 100) / Rank: 81st (out of 123 beers) / Probably the loudest beer I have had with a very bubbly head which didn’t settle for a long time.
The taste improved as it finally settled and did have a nice bitter aftertaste, so not really looking to trouble the scorers.
Check out how I rank all the beers I have tried on my Non-Alcoholic Beer Journey)

entry.title: Nothing But The Rain v.9
entry.summary:
Score: 22 (out of 100) / Rank: 117th (out of 123 beers) / Another Beer trying to cool down and this one was a lively little number.
No real smell but there was a strong sourness up front which didn’t sit well, almost soapy.
After two nice beers before this one left a sour taste and more annoyingly I have no more in the fridge!
